posts.post_content:
Too expensive for a far too specific effect.  
Even then, i'd splash red and play [Aura Barbs](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aura Barbs) instead if i was going to play against an aura-based deck. Although a simple [Tranquility](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tranquility) would still be more advisable against regular enchantment decks.
posts.html:
Too expensive for a far too specific effect.
Even then, i'd splash red and play Aura Barbs instead if i was going to play against an aura-based deck. Although a simple Tranquility would still be more advisable against regular enchantment decks.
